alert.note: Alert for Grand Staircase (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 25 at 2:34PM MDT until May 28 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 498... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS CANCELLED FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 498... The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday morning through Saturday evening. The Fire Weather Watch for Thursday has been cancelled. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 498 Grand Staircase. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Daytime minimum humidities low as 7 percent. Overnight humidity recoveries around 20 to 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are possible. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is a potential for critical fire weather conditions. Continue to monitor for the latest forecasts and for possible Red Flag Warnings.
